text: No person holding a position in the Executive Service may be appointed to a position in the Career, Educational, or Management Supervisory Service for at least one year immediately following his or her separation from the Executive Service, except that, upon termination, a person with Career, Educational, or Management Supervisory Service status may retreat, at the discretion of the Mayor, within 3 months to a vacant position in the service for which he or she is qualified.
